summary: Etap 1 features testing completed successfully. All 15 backend API tests passed. Frontend UI testing verified all new features working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: Added data-testid to favorite buttons in HomeFeed.js for better testability

admin_secret_login.details: /osyo route works, admin can login with admin@flulance.com/admin123, redirects to /admin

is_bitti_button.details: İş Bitti button visible in both Brand and Influencer dashboards for active matches

tamamlandi_status.details: Complete match endpoint works, status changes to 'Tamamlandı' when İş Bitti clicked

remaining_days_display.details: 'X gün kaldı' visible on approved jobs (e.g., '15 gün kaldı' on FATİHE GÖTTEN job)

message_read_status.details: Chat shows ✓ for sent messages, ✓✓ for read messages (görüldü işareti)

mobile_responsive.details: Hamburger menu works, mobile drawer shows all menu items, favorites page responsive

favorites_page.details: /favorites route works, shows favorited jobs with search and category filter

favorite_toggle.details: Heart icon toggles favorite status in HomeFeed, API endpoints work correctly

modal_scroll_fix.details: Create job modal header stays fixed when scrolling content

context_for_next_testing_agent: All Etap 1 features verified working. Backend API tests in /app/tests/test_etap1_features.py cover admin login, complete match, favorites, remaining days, and message read status. Frontend tested via Playwright for all UI features. Added data-testid to favorite buttons for future testing.
